title: Ghosts and the Girls of Sigma Epsilon Chi
description: Girls and the Ghosts of Sigma Epsilon Chi is the first book in a series of paranormal erotic stories by Veronica Hunt. We are introduced to Kat, Stephanie, and the other sweet and sexy girls of Sigma Epsilon Chi who are returning to school early to prepare for Rush, only to find that their sorority house has burned to the ground. Just as they are about to despair, an old founding member becomes their benefactor by donating her unwanted family mansion as the new sorority house.The girls are thrilled by this generous gift, and eagerly go to work getting the house ready for Rush and the start of school.Find out what secrets the mansion's past holds, as you join Kat and Stephanie for their first night in the master suites. What is causing them to have such erotic dreams? And why do they feel so real?
author: Veronica Hunt
